value: <steps id="0" last="4"><step id="2" type="ActionStep"><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><DIV><P>In a browser, navigate to http://quicklearn.com/transcript</P></DIV></DIV></parameterizedString><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><P><BR/></P></DIV></parameterizedString><description/></step><step id="3" type="ActionStep"><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><DIV><P>Type robc@quicklearn.com into the email lookup.</P></DIV></DIV></parameterizedString><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><P><BR/></P></DIV></parameterizedString><description/></step><step id="4" type="ValidateStep"><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><P>Click Lookup.</P></DIV></parameterizedString><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><P>Classes are presented</P></parameterizedString><description/></step></steps>
